body:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
As the tittle says, I'm gonna make giveaways. Probably premium accounts so.. the instructions are down here.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:
- The giveaways are gonna be made every 2 weeks.
- Different challenges are gonna be made for getting the account.
- Post a pic to show you already made the challenge so I can verify it and give you the prize
- This will be the only post I'll make and I'm gonna update every 2 weeks.
- Names can't be chosen, they're randomly generated.
- This 1st 2 weeks the challenge is gonna be about who get's the most XP
- First giveaway ends the 5th January
- There's not gonna be a same winner in a row.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
App Format:
IGN:
Skype: (If you don't wanna give your Skype through the comments section, YOU can add me (JuanoMC).
